Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
public class User extends Object

A User in the model.

Every User has a collection of Noticeboard.

The class provides methods to retrieve, add, remove and get the count of the Noticeboards.

    • User

      public User(int userID, String username, String password)

      Instantiates a new User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if userID is negative
      IllegalArgumentException - if username is null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if password is null or blank

    • getNoticeboard

      public Noticeboard getNoticeboard(String title)

      Gets a Noticeboard from the User.

      Parameters:
      title - the title
      Returns:
      the noticeboard if the user is able to view it, else null

    • getNoticeboard

      public Noticeboard getNoticeboard(int boardID)

      Gets a Noticeboard from the User.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the ID
      Returns:
      the noticeboard if the user is able to view it, else null

    • addNoticeboard

      public void addNoticeboard(Noticeboard noticeboard)

      Adds a Noticeboard to the User.

      Parameters:
      noticeboard - the noticeboard
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if noticeboard is null
      IllegalStateException - if a noticeboard with the same ID exists already

    • deleteNoticeboard

      public void deleteNoticeboard(String title)

      Deletes a Noticeboard from the User.

      Parameters:
      title - the title
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the noticeboard does not exist

      public void deleteNoticeboard(int boardID)

      Parameters:

      Throws:
